readme_content:
```rust fn main() { let me = Person { name: "Sreyas ✨", from: "India 🇮🇳", fav_lang: "Rust 🦀", age: Box::new(|current_year: u32| -> u32 { current_year - 2003 }), system: System { kernel: "Linux 🤓", os: Distro { name: "Fedora 🎩", version: 41, kernel_v: cmd("$(uname -r | cut -d"-" -f1)"), // 6.12.12 }, prev_distro: vec!["Ubuntu", "EndeavourOS", "ZorinOS"], }, dev: Dev { programming: Programming { languages: Languages { knows: vec!["Javascript", "TypeScript", "Python", "C", "C++", "Java", "Bash", "PHP"], learning: vec!["Rust 🦀"], }, web_development: WebDevelopment { knows: { let mut map = HashMap::new(); map.insert("frontEnd", vec!["React", "Javascript", "JQuery", "TailwindCSS", "HTML", "CSS", "SCSS", "SASS"]); map.insert("backEnd", vec!["PHP", "NodeJS", "Flash ⚡"]); // Just kidding, Actually I know it's Flask 🤫. map.insert("fullStack", vec!["NextJS"]); map.insert("lib", vec!["Redux", "React-router-dom", "Zustand", "Shadcn"]); map }, learning: { let mut map = HashMap::new(); map.insert("frontEnd", vec![]); map.insert("backEnd", vec!["Rust 🦀", "Actix", "Rocket", "Axum", "Express"]); map.insert("orm", vec!["Drizzle", "Prisma", "Diesel"]); map }, }, db: vec!["Supabase", "PostgreSQL", "MongoDB", "MySql", "MariaDB", "OracleDB", "Firebase"], mobile: Mobile { learning: vec!["ReactNative"], }, }, }, tools: Tools { design: vec!["Figma"], workflow: vec!["Git", "Github"], }, editors: vec!["VScode ❤️", "Zed", "VIM ⚡", "NeoVim 🔥"], browsers: vec!["Zen", "Firefox", "Chrome"], }; println!("{:#?}", me); } ```

profile_summary: As a seasoned software developer with a strong foundation in programming languages, I leverage my expertise in C, TypeScript, and Kotlin to craft scalable solutions. With 45 public repositories and a growing community of 12 followers, I continue to contribute to the open-source ecosystem through active development and collaboration. Through a holistic approach that combines programming skills with a passion for design and workflow optimization, I aim to deliver high-quality software applications that meet the needs of diverse stakeholders.
